name: Ninja Jump - Samurai Adventure Story Run
name_original: Ninja Jump - Samurai Adventure Story Run
description:
Jump, Fly, Tap and Bounce your way through the Obstacle Course with your Ninja. The bumbling Sensei has mislaid all the Ninja Stars and you must help your Samurai collect them all on his biggest adventure yet!

Introducing our skilled ninja and heir to the world, the most awesome and sneaky samurai the realms have ever seen. Travel with him through the 5 oriental worlds collecting all the treasury gold along the way. Jump crazy spinning wheels, fire from dragons and find the magic elixirs that will speed you on your way. Use your skills to guide the Ninja and help him complete each stage and win him all 10 achievements….have fun!

Great Features:

- One Tap addictive game play
- 25 unique fun filled levels
- Travel through 5 spectacular Oriental Realms
- Endless Run Mode. How far through the World you can go?
- Magic Dragons, Golden Chests and Ninja stars to help your quest
- Game Center Achievement Leaderboard
